author: Romain Dillet
title: Watch Huawei’s MWC conference live right here | TechCrunch
text:
Watch Huawei’s MWC conference live right here Posted LG proves that taller screens are the future of smartphones 
Huawei’s press conference at MWC in Barcelona is about to begin. The conference starts at 2 PM CET (1 PM GMT, 8 AM EST). 
The company has already said that it’ll unveil the P10, its new flagship phone. You can expect a double camera system and a big update across the board. Huawei has become a leading brand, especially in China. So it’s going to be interesting to see how Huawei plans 
You can check it out live via Huawei’s official stream above, and stay tuned on TechCrunch.com for ongoing coverage of all the news coming out of MWC . 0
